Container.Name: Membarr
Container.Overview: Membarr is a discord bot that invites discord users to Plex and/or Jellyfin. Manually create users and invite channel members with a single command, or let Membarr automatically add channel members with a certain role.
Container.Description:
Membarr is a discord bot that invites discord users to Plex and/or Jellyfin. Manually create users and invite channel members with a single command, or let Membarr automatically add channel bridge
/mnt/user/appdata/Membarr/ /app/app/config rw
token
<Config Name="Config" Target="/app/app/config" Default="/mnt/user/appdata/Invitarr/" Mode="rw" Description="Config path" Type="Path" Display="always"
